DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Lifestyle factor , physical activity , diet , obesity , hormone function may affect breast density . Screening test , mammography , may help doctor find tumor cell early plan well treatment breast cancer . PURPOSE : This clinical trial study effect lifestyle factor hormone function breast density healthy Hispanic woman undergo mammography breast cancer screening .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Lifestyle Factors Hormone Function Breast Density Healthy Hispanic Women Who Are Undergoing Mammography Breast Cancer Screening
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Correlate physical activity , diet , obesity , measure body mass index waist circumference , percent breast density absolute estimate total dense breast area healthy Hispanic woman undergo screen mammography . - Correlate fasting serum insulin growth factor ( IGF ) -1 molar ratio IGF-1 IGF bind protein-3 breast density participant undergo screen mammography . - Correlate insulin concentration insulin resistance breast density participant undergo screen mammography . OUTLINE : This multicenter study . Participants undergo blood collection physical examination . Participants also complete breast cancer risk factor , food frequency , physical activity questionnaire receive breast health physical activity education . Participants undergo digital screening mammogram . Participants notify mammogram result . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 114 participant accrue study .
DOC.criteria: DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS : Healthy Hispanic woman Registered patient Erie Family Health Centers ' West Town Humboldt Park clinics No screening mammography within past 12 month No abnormality clinical breast exam No history breast cancer Hormone receptor status : Not specify PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS : Age 40 Sex Female Menopausal status Not specify Performance status Not specify Life expectancy Not specify Hematopoietic Not specify Hepatic Not specify Renal Not specify Other Not pregnant PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY : Biologic therapy Not specify Chemotherapy Not specify Endocrine therapy Not specify Radiotherapy Not specify Surgery Not specify
